masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"Someone is kidnapping every mall Santa in the city! Seven have disappeared in the last four hours. The latest one was grabbed right off his throne—witnesses say it was a woman in an elf costume with super-strength. She keeps muttering about 'ending the lie.' What is she PLANNING?"

Requirements

  • Track down the kidnapped mall Santas
  • Figure out the villain's endgame—what's the plan?
  • Stop her before Christmas is ruined for thousands of kids
